Y Can't The Uploader check comments and answer to queries of downloaders
it'll hardly take 5 mins.

Since The Uploader Didnt Bother To Answer Your Questions Here's a Guide Clearing your doubts
To Install----
1-Mount TVM_BAAGOTY.ISO using power iso or daemon tools
2-After installation open mounted dvd and then open folder TRiViUM and file paul.dll and paste it in installation directory C-Program Files-Square Enix-Batman Arkham Asylum GOTY-Binaries
If your antivirus detects paul.dll as virus its false positive so crete an exclusion for it my eset detected it as virus bt it was false positive
3-After this open game using BmStartApp.exe
4-After intro video in start screen where it shows "Click To Start" press the "HOME" key in keyboard den it will open game for live windows  there click create new profile option then scroll down and you will find option highlighted in blue "Create local profile" give a name and continue your done you will have no saving problem

And ya it does have any kind of problem in reloaded and other releases
Its perfectly nice and Clean
